      • disconnectAll

        boolean disconnectAll(ModelAddress modelAddress)
        Parameters:
        modelAddress - ModelAddress
        Returns:
        true, if given modelAddress was connected to any other modelAddress and got successfully disconnected

      • getConnectedAddresses

        java.util.Collection<ModelAddress> getConnectedAddresses(ModelAddress modelAddress)
        Parameters:
        modelAddress - ModelAddress
        Returns:
        collection of all other addresses the given modelAddress is currently connected to, or empty collection if there are no connected addresses

      • hasConnectedAddresses

        boolean hasConnectedAddresses(ModelAddress modelAddress)
        Parameters:
        modelAddress - ModelAddress
        Returns:
        true, if given modelAddress is currently connected to any other modelAddress

      • getAllConnectedAddresses

        java.util.Collection<ModelAddress> getAllConnectedAddresses()
        Returns:
        all addresses that are currently connected

      • getQualifiyingAddresses

        java.util.Collection<ModelAddress> getQualifiyingAddresses(ModelAddressQualifier qualifier)
        Returns:
        all addresses that are currently connected and are qualified by the given qualifier

      • clear

        void clear()
        Completely clear the routing table.
